title: insufficient amount of detail is provided upon "install" failure
body:
I think that entire stderr should be brought up/out since otherwise it is not clear why install failed and requires probably running in debug mode or just git command directly:

```shell
smaug:/tmp
$> datalad install -s /mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces                         
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from '/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces' (trying 1 location candidates) to '/tmp/surfaces' 
[ERROR  ] Failed to clone data from any candidate source URL: ['/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces'] [install(/tmp/surfaces)] 
install(error): /tmp/surfaces (dataset) [Failed to clone data from any candidate source URL: ['/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces']]
datalad install -s   3.76s user 9.20s system 29% cpu 44.503 total

smaug:/tmp
$> ls -l /mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces -a
total 4
drwx--S--- 1 yoh datalad  72 Jun  5 21:12 ./
drwx--S--- 1 yoh datalad 116 May 25 07:57 ../
drwx--S--- 1 yoh datalad  50 May 25 07:57 .datalad/
drwx--S--- 1 yoh datalad 214 Jun 12 09:54 .git/
-rw------- 1 yoh datalad  20 May 25 07:57 .gitattributes
drwx--S--- 1 yoh datalad   6 May 30 16:56 freesurfer/
(dev)3 11862.....................................:Mon 12 Jun 2017 10:01:37 AM EDT:.
smaug:/tmp
$> git clone /mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces
Cloning into 'surfaces'...
done.
error: unable to create symlink freesurfer/5.3/9956994/mri/talairach_with_skull.log (No space left on device)
error: unable to create symlink freesurfer/5.3/9956994/mri/talairach_with_skull_2.log (No space left on device)
fatal: cannot create directory at 'freesurfer/5.3/9956994/mri/transforms': No space left on device
warning: Clone succeeded, but checkout failed.
You can inspect what was checked out with 'git status'
and retry the checkout with 'git checkout -f HEAD'

git clone /mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl-misc/indi/adhd200/surfaces  1.55s user 5.33s system 25% cpu 26.586 total
```
